description: Roserade is the final evolution of the Budew line of Pok√©mon. Instead of the two roses Roselia had Roserade now has a bouquet of roses on each arm. It lures is prey with a sweet aroma,then attcks with the movements of a dancer. It also has vines that are hidden behind the bouquet of flowers. Roselia evolves into Roserade when exposed to a Shiny Stone. Roserade has a "cape." The female`s is longer than the male`s.
name: Roserade
